CustomField.description: Enabling Default Allocations creates an Allocation object for each Opportunity. This enables reporting on allocations to a default General Accounting Unit, but uses more data storage.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enabling Default Allocations creates an Allocation object for each Opportunity. This enables reporting on allocations to a default General Accounting Unit, but uses more data storage.
CustomField.label: Default Allocations Enabled
